About Me

Hi I am Sujin Kim ,

Student, University of Waterloo CS

2017 — present

Proudly CS student at University of Waterloo. I first got accepted to the university as a Math major, even though I applied for CS. However, after trying hard, I successfully transferred to CS at the end of the second year. I am currently fourth year CS student at University of Waterloo.

Instructor, Mathnasium, Waterloo

2019 — present

Mathnasium is an academy that teaches math intensively to the students from kindergarten to high school. The main job is to explain concepts of math skills to children, answer questions and to help them solve problems.
